title: R.I.P League
body: So this is it huh? I can't believe the company that developed a game I love and played for years ( since late season 4 ) would go down like this. I t would've been better if you went the people thought you would die from. By the huge balance issues that has been plaguing this game sine season but no you decided to get political and sacrifice yourself to the the "progressive" hypocrites.
